item.title: CVE-2024-44045|2024-10-07T12:30:28.869Z -- kevon%20adonis -- wp%20abstracts
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Kevon Adonis WP Abstracts allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Abstracts: from n/a through 2.6.5.
